languages.text: "Помни, что все здесь — лишь отражение твоих мыслей, чувств и желаний. Не бойся смотреть им в лицо".
"Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."
languages.original_text: "Помни, что все здесь — лишь отражение твоих мыслей, чувств и желаний. Не бойся смотреть им в лицо".

traits.locale_text: "Remember that everyone her are just the reflections of your thoughts, feelings and desires. Don't be afraid to look them in the eye."
"Remember that everyone her are just the reflections of your thoughts, feelings and desires. Don't be afraid to look them in the eye."
"Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."
"Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."
"Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."

languages.text: “别忘了，这里的每个人都只是你的想法、感受和愿望的具象。不要害怕，直视他们的眼睛。”
languages.original_text: "Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."

traits.locale_text: “别忘了，这里的每个人都只是你的想法、感受和愿望的具象。不要害怕，直视他们的眼睛。”

languages.text: «Recuerda que todas las personas que ves aquí son un reflejo de tus propios pensamientos, emociones y deseos. No temas mirarles fijamente a los ojos».
languages.original_text: "Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerda que todas las personas que ves aquí son un reflejo de tus propios pensamientos, emociones y deseos. No temas mirarles fijamente a los ojos».

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas que tout le monde ici est un simple reflet de vos pensées, sentiments et désirs. N'ayez pas peur de les regarder dans les yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas que tout le monde ici est un simple reflet de vos pensées, sentiments et désirs. N'ayez pas peur de les regarder dans les yeux. »

languages.text: "Vergesst nicht, dass jeder hier nur eine Reflexion Eurer Gedanken, Gefühle und Wünsche ist. Habt keine Angst, ihnen in die Augen zu blicken."
languages.original_text: "Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."

traits.locale_text: "Vergesst nicht, dass jeder hier nur eine Reflexion Eurer Gedanken, Gefühle und Wünsche ist. Habt keine Angst, ihnen in die Augen zu blicken."

languages.text: 「ここにいる誰もが、お前の考え、感情、欲望の反映にすぎないことを忘れるな。彼らの目を見ることを恐れてはならない」
languages.original_text: "Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."

traits.locale_text: 「ここにいる誰もが、お前の考え、感情、欲望の反映にすぎないことを忘れるな。彼らの目を見ることを恐れてはならない」

languages.text: "Buradaki herkesin düşüncelerinin, hislerinin ve isteklerinin birer yansıması olduğunu unutma. Gözlerinin içine bakmaktan korkmana gerek yok."
languages.original_text: "Remember that everyone here is just a reflection of your thoughts, feelings, and desires. Do not be afraid to look them in the eye."

traits.locale_text: "Buradaki herkesin düşüncelerinin, hislerinin ve isteklerinin birer yansıması olduğunu unutma. Gözlerinin içine bakmaya korkmana gerek yok."
